name: Truck You
description:
Note: This game supports up to 4 controllers!

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

Player 1 (Green): Arrow Keys

Player 2 (Red): WASD

Player 3 (Yellow): TFGH

Player 4 (Purple): IJKL

*Spacebar is used to select/pause*

*F1 key is used for native window size*

*F2 key is used for expanded window size*

Have you ever wanted to violently race your friends in traffic, but were afraid of the legal ramifications? Well, now you can do just that with no fear of the authorities! Race towards the high score as you battle in 2 or 4 player co-op. Who will come out on top? Or, if you don't have any friends, test your skills alone in single player mode!

As always, please let me know if you encounter any issues! Happy trucking!
